How do I restore my wallet without backing it up first?

You can't restore your wallet without backing it up first. In fact, backing up your wallet is **HIGHLY RECOMMENDED**. Before you can restore your wallet, you need to have a backup to restore from. The correct procedure is to back up your wallet and then, if needed, restore your wallet from the backup.
